faq.que: What is the method of getting enrolled on this course?
faq.ans: No you don’t need to create account. You just need to buy this course, enter all the necessary details and pay the course fees post which we will provide you course access to start learning Scala.

faq.que: Do you provide any certification at the end of this course?
faq.ans: Yes, reference documents containing Scala practicals will be available in your LMS.

faq.que: How long can I access the course?
faq.ans: All the sessions will be recorded and you will have lifetime access to the Spark and Scala training course recordings along with the complete study material, POCs, Spark project etc.

faq.que: I have never worked on Java. Is it mandatory to learn Scala?
faq.ans: Though prior java knowledge is good to learn Scala but it is not mandatory to know java before learning Scala.

faq.que: When will I be able to access the scala course?
faq.ans: As soon as you enrol for the Scala self-paced course, you will be provided LMS access to start learning Scala.
Please drop us a query on our contact us form and our customer support team will call you.

faq.que: For how long will we get access to discussion forum to post our queries?
faq.ans: You will get lifetime access to discussion forum to post your queries.
